nodes.title: Learn the basics of CSS
nodes.desc: Understand the fundamental concepts of CSS, including selectors, properties, and values. [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/CSS/First_steps)

nodes.title: Understand the importance of utility-first CSS
nodes.desc: Recognize the benefits of using utility-first CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/utility-first)

nodes.title: Learn about accessibility
nodes.desc: Understand how to use Tailwind's accessibility features to create accessible applications. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/accessibility)

nodes.title: Use Tailwind's dark mode feature
nodes.desc: Create applications with a dark mode using Tailwind's built-in feature. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/dark-mode)

nodes.title: Learn about Tailwind's PurgeCSS integration
nodes.desc: Understand how to use PurgeCSS to optimize your CSS file size. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/optimizing-for-production)

nodes.title: Use Tailwind's CSS-in-JS support
nodes.desc: Use Tailwind with CSS-in-JS libraries like styled-components or emotion. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/css-in-js)

nodes.title: Learn about Tailwind's community
nodes.desc: Participate in the Tailwind community to get help and share knowledge. [Tailwind CSS Community](https://tailwindcss.com/community)

nodes.title: Read the official documentation
nodes.desc: Stay up-to-date with the latest features and best practices. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs)

nodes.title: Watch video tutorials
nodes.desc: Learn from video tutorials and online courses. [Tailwind CSS YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/tailwindcss)

nodes.title: Join online communities
nodes.desc: Participate in online communities like Reddit's r/tailwindcss. [Reddit's r/tailwindcss](https://www.reddit.com/r/tailwindcss/)

nodes.title: Attend conferences and meetups
nodes.desc: Network with other developers and learn from experts. [Tailwind CSS Meetup Group](https://www.meetup.com/tailwindcss/)

nodes.title: Read blog posts and articles
nodes.desc: Stay up-to-date with the latest news and trends. [Tailwind CSS Blog](https://blog.tailwindcss.com/)

nodes.title: Install Tailwind CSS
nodes.desc: Set up Tailwind CSS in your project using npm or yarn. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/installation)

nodes.title: Configure Tailwind CSS
nodes.desc: Customize the configuration file to suit your project's needs. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/configuration)

nodes.title: Learn about Tailwind's pre-defined classes
nodes.desc: Understand the different classes available in Tailwind CSS, such as text, font, and spacing classes. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/utility-first)

nodes.title: Use Tailwind's utility classes
nodes.desc: Apply utility classes to style your HTML elements. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/utility-first)

nodes.title: Customize Tailwind's design tokens
nodes.desc: Modify the design tokens to change the look and feel of your application. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/theme)

nodes.title: Use Tailwind's plugin system
nodes.desc: Extend Tailwind's functionality with custom plugins. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/plugins)

nodes.title: Learn about responsive design
nodes.desc: Understand how to use Tailwind's responsive design features to create mobile-friendly applications. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/responsive-design)

nodes.title: Use Tailwind's grid system
nodes.desc: Create complex layouts using Tailwind's grid system. [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/grid)
